coverAlt: A closeup of pink and white roses from above
title: How to Do Nothing
subTitle: Resisting the Attention Economy
author: Jenny Odell
description: Written by an artist who draws from history to understand how we can live a more purposeful life. The provocative title actually implies a balance we need to achieve and the necessity of missing out.

coverAlt: An illustration of a mouse in a red cape riding on the back of a crow
title: Mrs. Frisby and the Rats of NIMH
author: Robert C. O'Brien
description: Adding some books that I am reading to my child. This is one that I was very excited to share with her.
